text: allah mata (edas pavarannata) minisunta kisima margayak notibima pinisa mema dutayingen pasuvada (sækariyiya, yahya væni) dutayin bohomayak denava (svargaya magin) subharamci pavasannan vasayenda (niraya magin) biya ganva anaturu angavannan vasayenda (api yava ættemu). allah (siyallantama) balasampannayeku ha gnanavantayeku vasayen sitinneya
